about_the_game:
Hold on in the Dungeons

About the Game:

"Hold on in the Dungeons" is a 2D action-simulation game where you build and develop a team to clear dungeons. Strategize well and assemble the best team to achieve victory in challenging dungeons.

Key Features:

  • Team Building – Form and develop a team with characters that have distinct abilities and skills. Create the perfect synergy and optimize your strategy to clear dungeons.

  • Unique Abilities & Customization – Each character can be customized with unique skill builds, allowing for a wide range of strategic playstyles.

  • Dungeon Survival & Tower Defense – Experience a unique mix of survival mechanics and tower defense elements, requiring both tactical decision-making and character progression.

  • Diverse Character Classes – Choose from 6 different character classes, each fitting into one of three combat styles:

    • Melee: Warrior, Assassin

    • Half-Range: Spellblade, Elementalist

    • Long-Range: Wizard, Hunter

  • Sin Mechanic – Each character can possess a unique sin, adding an extra layer of depth to team composition and strategic planning.

  • Character Growth & Equipment – Strengthen your characters by equipping them with weapons and armor while leveling them up to survive against stronger enemies.

name: Hold on in the Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 1.4Ghz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: 1.4Ghz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Hold on in the Dungeons - Time to Hunt
supported_languages: English, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Polish, Ukrainian, Swedish, Filipino, Hindi, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Japanese, Russian, Turkish, Vietnamese, Thai
